description.value:
Trigger You are the target of a physical ranged Strike.

Requirements You're aware of the attack, not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] against it, and either have a hand free or are wielding a melee weapon.

You can knock aside ranged attacks.

You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, you knocked or cut it out of the air.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Cut from the Air]
